stories.title: Yandex Food Fined 60k Rubles (US$773) for Leaking User Data

stories.text:
I love Notion! We've been using it for a few months at my startup and it's completely replaced Jira, Confluence Wiki, and Google Docs. I've also used it to replace my super janky home-rolled "wiki" of Google Docs, and everything feels so much cleaner, discoverable, and organized.

Notion's primitives (pages, sub-pages, templates, and databases) hit the sweet spot of being customizable while also being usable. There are still some things I would like to change about the UX (shortcuts for all the things!), but overall I'm a very happy customer.

Anyway, just wanted to throw out some support for a product I've been happy with lately. Try it out![1]

[1]: https://www.notion.so/
